meta.description: Make's Minecraft's rivers much more exciting to explore!
meta.long_description:
River Redux is a Fabric and Forge mod that improves Vanilla's river generation and provides 3 new river biomes to add variety! Currently it adds a sandy river, a gravelly river, and a tropical river. More rivers biomes are planned as well. River Redux requires Terrablender. When on a server, only the server needs the mod installed.

 

### Discord Server
https://discord.gg/EwQmvQtshV
Join the discord to get information about future updates, talk about the mod, and share screenshots!

 

### Images

Sandy River:
![Sandy](https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/817769622392012812/1005518542457819236/unknown.png?width=1189&height=630)
Gravelly River:
![Gravelly](https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/817769622392012812/1005518558719123508/unknown.png?width=1189&height=630)
Tropical River:
![Tropical](https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/817769622392012812/1005518503845044425/unknown.png?width=1189&height=630)
